snippet: Rafael Nadal pulled out of the Queen's Club grass-court tournament that serves as a tuneup for Wimbledon, citing the left wrist injury that cut his French Open short....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal pulled out of the Queen's Club grass-court tournament that serves as a tuneup for Wimbledon, citing the left wrist injury that cut his French Open short.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Pulls Out of Tuneup for Wimbledon, Citing Wrist Injury
headline.main: Nadal Pulls Out of Tuneup for Wimbledon, Citing Wrist Injury
